description:
Municipalities' share of income tax

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
71231 Comparison of non-personal taxes

Definition:
Share to which the municipalities are entitled, that is, 15%
of the revenue from wage tax and assessed income tax and 12%
of the revenue from interest withholding tax in the relevant
Land (after distribution). For 2012, 2013 and 2014, the
share of any individual municipality is based on its share
of the total income tax amounts determined by wage and
income tax statistics for 2007. These tax amounts are
included only up to specific basic amounts of the taxable
income. The basic amounts are 30,000 euros, or 60,000 euros
in the case of joint assessment.
